amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-459 to reduce spending in Division A (State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs) by 5 percent.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce spending in Division A (State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs) by 5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 88 - 329 (Roll no. 159).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Allen.
